column5: Our Business Analytics MSc is taught in collaboration with multinational companies and will give you the essential skillset they are looking for. It has been developed by theÂ Neo-demographic Laboratory for Analytics in Business (N-LAB), a state-of-the-art teaching, data visualisation and research facility within the Business School.You will benefit from the engagement of N/Lab's multi-national partners, who include Ipsos, World Bank, Walgreens Boots Alliance and IBM Research. In addition to guest lectures, coursework will be based on real-world datasets and your dissertation will use transactional data from a real company.
column7: Neo-demographic Laboratory for Analytics in Business (N-LAB)
